name: Guerra Mcbride
comment: I like that not only can I time my social media posts but I can also see my the display of the feed that will be displayed on IG.

name: Abbott Velez
comment: The best feature of this book was the ability to batch schedule Pins to Pinterest. Additionally, helpful SmartSchedule feature.

name: Gilda Melendez
comment: One of the best features of this book is that it allows you to schedule your instagram posts. So, you can curate content.

name: Amparo Hart
comment: I love that I can easily schedule all my week on Pinterest in one sitting. This book has a lot of great tools to learn music.

name: Cotton Mcknight
comment: This book create and also the ease of use of the platform. It's easy to upload and optimize pins or posts in bulk. Marvelous book.

name: Fitzgerald Jacobson
comment: It USED to be an easy and efficient way to schedule social media posts. I loved the features and the results I saw from using this book.
